meanings.sent1: She sang excellently at the school concert.
meanings.sent2: The chef cooked the meal excellently.
meanings.sent3: The cat chased the mouse excellently around the house.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone excellently through the clouds.
meanings.sent5: The students listened excellently to the teacher's instructions.

meanings.definition: To a high degree of quality or skill
meanings.sent1: He excelled excellently in his math exam.
meanings.sent2: The team excelled excellently in the championship game.
meanings.sent3: The flowers in the garden excellently bloomed overnight.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas excellently blossomed into successful projects.
meanings.sent5: The artist's talent excellently painted a masterpiece.
